selections.name: Tricia's Rainbow
selections.reason: First starter who looked sharp winning a trial at Scone on Jan 30. Finds a winnable race on debut.

selections.name: Blocker
selections.reason: Showed ability in a recent trial at Canterbury (Metro) finishing 2nd. The Sunshine Coast debut was respectable.

selections.name: Leuca
selections.reason: Has race experience on the board with a solid 4th at Newcastle last start. Draws the rail.

selections.name: Leppitsch
selections.reason: Cavanough/Roper combination commands respect. Trialled okay on heavy ground.

danger_horse.name: Blocker
danger_horse.reason: Metro trial form often stacks up well in country maidens.

selections.name: Lucky Ozzie
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 3rd at Beaumont (Provincial) in similar conditions. That form line is superior to most here.

selections.name: Visualise
selections.reason: Consistent performer who was not far away at Tamworth last start. Should be in the finish.

selections.name: Proclivity
selections.reason: Last start winner at Gilgandra. Confidence is up and can go on with it.

selections.name: Disco Prince
selections.reason: Carries top weight but drops into a winnable race. 3rd up and ready to peak.

danger_horse.name: Visualise
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: The Bentley
selections.reason: Ran a very credible 4th at Newcastle in a Super Maiden last start. That Provincial form is the gold standard for this field.

selections.name: Magic Merlin
selections.reason: Solid debut 2nd at Walcha. Will improve for the experience. Top stable.

selections.name: Miss Maverick
selections.reason: Chased hard for 2nd at Orange last time out. Fitter now.

selections.name: My Sweetheart
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter who draws well.

danger_horse.name: Magic Merlin
danger_horse.reason: Cavanough/Bullock combination is lethal in these races.

selections.name: Second Swing
selections.reason: Resuming for the Cavanough yard. Trialled well and gets Aaron Bullock. Looks primed.

selections.name: Breukelen
selections.reason: Debutant who won a trial at Scone. Draws the inside and must be respected.

selections.name: Toke
selections.reason: Ran a decent 4th at Muswellbrook on heavy ground. Will appreciate the firmer footing.

selections.name: Thirty Degrees
selections.reason: Fair effort at Walcha last start. Place claims.

selections.name: Snatchreilly
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at Walcha last start behind a handy one. Draws perfectly to strike.

selections.name: En Primeur
selections.reason: Last start winner at Walcha. In career best form.

selections.name: Gelsey
selections.reason: Also a last start winner at Walcha. Wide draw makes it slightly tougher but has speed.

selections.name: Nation Changing
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a trial at Scone and has ability when fresh.

danger_horse.name: En Primeur
danger_horse.reason: Hard to knock a last start winner in this grade.

selections.name: Defiant Heart
selections.reason: Brings superior Provincial form (2nd at Gosford BM64). This is a significant class drop.

selections.name: Dune And Dusted
selections.reason: Won the Lightning Handicap at Walcha last start. Loves this trip.

selections.name: Chandon Star
selections.reason: Winner of a BM82 at Tamworth two starts back. dangerous.

selections.name: Inazuma Boy
selections.reason: Won well at Dubbo last start. Draws the rails.

danger_horse.name: Dune And Dusted
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and beat a similar field last time.

selections.name: Hibiki Harmony
selections.reason: Ran 4th in a BM72 at Randwick last start. That Metro form is lengths better than anything else here. The one to beat.

selections.name: Aimpoint
selections.reason: Also brings Metro form (Canterbury/Newcastle). Big weight but has the class.

selections.name: The Dramatist
selections.reason: Highway performer who will appreciate the drop to Country Cup level.

selections.name: Otium
selections.reason: Runner-up in the Walcha Cup. Honest campaigner.

danger_horse.name: Aimpoint
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field, just needs luck from the draw/weight.

selections.name: Mclovin
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at Walcha last start. Ready to win now 3rd up.

selections.name: Mellencamp
selections.reason: Drops from Provincial grade (Newcastle). Wide draw is a concern but has the ability.

selections.name: Silent Serenade
selections.reason: Broke maiden status in style at Walcha. Can go on with it despite the wide gate.

selections.name: Halle Bee
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed at Walcha. Each way claims.
